name: Starlight Stadium Ep.2
description:
Play a one-of-a-kind game that sends you on a virtual human rights monitoring mission in a fictional country.

Choose your character name and the language you want to play. Now available in English, Russian, and Ukrainian!

You will gradually learn and apply the core skills needed to investigate human rights violations: monitoring, digital security, data collection, interviewing, and much more.

Leave a comment below with your insights, your feedback is valuable to make this game a better experience!

Post your achievement board and let us know how you did!

Click the link to the Beta Launch video, if you want to know more about the development process and the team:
